C

CheckWorkingMemory - Class in org.dei.whynot
Class CheckWorkingMemory is used to verify why a conclusion is false, searching for the causes that that prevented a conclusion to be obtained
conclusionFromRuleDoesNotExist(String, String, String) - Method in class org.dei.whynot.CheckWorkingMemory
If rule 'ruleName' was been triggered, a conclusion matching 'DRLConclusion' pattern would be achieved
conditionIsFalse(String) - Method in class org.dei.whynot.CheckWorkingMemory
Check if a rule condition is false calling a query
convertConstructorToDRL(String) - Method in class org.dei.whynot.KnowledgeBase
Convert class constructor call to drl pattern (condition)
convertDRLPatternToConstructor(PatternDescr) - Method in class org.dei.whynot.KnowledgeBase
Convert drl pattern (condition) to class constructor format

D

DroolsInit - Class in org.dei.whynot
DroolsInit class is used to create a Drools KieSession and all the required assets needed to generate whynot explanations

G

getConclusionFromRhs(String) - Method in class org.dei.whynot.RuleWM
Get list of conclusions of a given type included in RHS

I

init(KieSession, KnowledgeBase) - Static method in class org.dei.whynot.CheckWorkingMemory
Method that ensures the creation of a unique instance of CheckWorkingMemory class

Method that ensures the creation of a unique instance of WhyNot class
initiateDrools(String) - Static method in class org.dei.whynot.DroolsInit
Creates a singleton instance of an object containing the initialization of a Drools session and the resources needed to generate whynot explanations
isBasicFact(String) - Method in class org.dei.whynot.KnowledgeBase
Check if a object/fact type is a basic fact (a fact that never appears in rules' RHS)

K

KnowledgeBase - Class in org.dei.whynot
KnowledgeBase class is used to represent in memory the contents of the DRL files included in the project, plus a set of dynamically generated queries to evaluate rule conditions.
KnowledgeBase(String) - Constructor for class org.dei.whynot.KnowledgeBase
Constructor

L

LOG - Static variable in class org.dei.whynot.WhyNot
Logger reference

O

org.dei.whynot - package org.dei.whynot
org.dei.whynot implements a Why Not explanation module The classes implementing the module reside in package org.dei.whynot, which include five classes: CheckWorkingMemory DroolsInit KnowledgeBase RuleWM WhyNot

R

RuleWM - Class in org.dei.whynot
RuleWM class is used to describe a rule using the rule description gathered from DRL file parsing
RuleWM(String, RuleDescr) - Constructor for class org.dei.whynot.RuleWM
Constructor for class RuleWM used to describe rules with information gathered from DRL files

W

WhyNot - Class in org.dei.whynot
WhyNot class implements the singleton pattern to ensure the creation of an unique instance.
